tool.name: Run Cross Sample
tool.description: using a Flow file that was run using FLOCK
tool.help:
This tool runs CrossSample using the MFI from FLOCK and a text-converted FCS file.
-----
**Input**
This tool compares a text-converted FCS file to the MFI generated by a FLOCK run. Ideally the original FCS file was used in the super-set of files concatenated and ran through FLOCK to obtain the MFIs.
**Output**
Each event is attributed to a given population depending on its intensity profile.
-----
**Example**
*Input text file*::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 33 47 11 31 64 11 21 62 99 14 34 60
*Input MFI*::
Population Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 1 38 49 10 2 21 63 100 3 31 52 45 4 11 78 25
*Output*::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 Population 33 47 11 1 31 64 11 6 21 62 99 2 14 34 60 7
